text: Timiharusanga bud'dhi bha'e aphai herihala ki timi ta tiniharula'i cahanchau tara tiniharu timisamga mitrata gardainan. Timi sabai granthaharuma visvasa gardachau. (Tiniharu mandainan) tiniharule timra samu imana lya'eko svikara gardachan ra jaba timibata alaga hunchan ta timisamga krodhako karanale aphnai aunla tokna thaldachan. Bhanide'u! Ki timiharu krodhamai marihala, allaha timra hrdayaka rahasyaharula'i ramrari bujhdacha
